value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24109v1", "title": "Demailly's approximation of general weights: A conjecture of Matsumura", "summary": "In this note, we address a conjecture posed by Matsumura, which gives the\nconvergence of the Demailly approximation of a general (weakly) upper\nsemi-continuous weight.", "main_category": "math.CV", "categories": "math.CV", "published": "2025-03-31T14:01:26Z"}
